name: Aali
description: Aali was one of Conan's camp, who was captured and cooked by a couple of cannibal goblins who lived in the caves of Mount Raktavashi.[1]

name: Abbas
description: Mrs. Abbas was the mother of Yusef, a boy who developed powers and used them in the service of the Toledo community with the hero name of the Helper.[2]

name: Abbott
description: Mr and Mrs. Abbott were May Parker's nextdoor neighbors, who asked her to join them for a week on a trip to Florida after she came out the hospital.[3]

name: Abby
description: Abby was Nigel Frobisher's secretary.[4]

name: Abby
description: Abby was a prostitute whose body was possessed by the spirit of a Wicca belonging to the ancient Celtic tribe of the Iceni who woke up when Satana arrived in London, convinced that she was the mighty matriarch they had been waiting for and that would guide them.[5]

name: Abby
description: Abby was an eccentric painter who worked in large-scale abstracts, usually motion studies and post-figurative imagery.[6]

name: Abdul
description: Abdul was a Mohammedan who surprised the Defenders inside King Richard's prison.[7]

name: Abdul
appearences: Peter Parker, The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 68
description: While investigating the Robot-Master, Arabian Intelligence agent Abdul ran into Spider-Man.[8]

name: Abe
description: Abe was a homeless person from Cleveland who was protected by Songbird from H.A.M.M.E.R.[9]

name: Abib
description: Abib was a lazy soldier confronted by Kaleb the Destroyer when he came to Bhoraji to organize and prepare the army for Conan's arrival.[10]

name: Abigail
description:
Abigail was a friend of Sersi.[11]
She was told by her about meeting Mark Curry.[12]
Abigail tried to talk with her friend about what happened at the Vorozheikan Embassy.[13]
Her memories were eventually erased by Ikaris.[14]

name: Abrams
description: Abrams was the general manager of the Revenge Inc. who financially helped Diana Simon and her father in exchange for being able to perform experiments on Diana, and because of these experiments Abrams was killed by Diana.[15]

name: Abrams
description: Dr. Abrams coached Firepower until Edwin Cord convinced Senator Boynton Firepower was capable of concluding his testing without external interference.[16]

name: Ace
description:
Ace was one of the gunmen who assaulted the Pecos train in 1873.[17]
Defeated by the Avengers, Ace eventually told them how to break into Kang's citadel in Tombstone.[18]

name: Ace
description: Ace was a member of a gang of techno-thieves who were about to steal millions of dollars worth of ceramic conductor chips arriving at LaGuardia Airport from California, but were surprised by Spider-Man during the theft and captured.[19]

name: Achmed
description: When Victoria Bentley was attacked by Achmed to force her to reveal to him how to take possession of the Ebony Blade, Sean Dolan responded to her cries for help and managing to extract the Ebony Blade himself, he turned into Bloodwraith and killed Achmed.[20]

name: Acrallidus
description: Acrallidus was the city governor of Khauran. He allied with Conan to unmask Baron Sabaninus and uncover his plot to assassinate Taramis.[21]

name: Adamson
description: Adamson was Tso Zhung's personal assistant.[22]

name: Ada
description: Ada was an artist who used the Fibonacci sequence in her paintings to represent reality. When Ada described one of her works to Peter Parker, Peter lit up and thanked Ada and immediately ran off saying that there was something he had to do.[23]

name: Adaobi
description: Adaobi was a Beyond employee working on cleaning the seaweed tanks who was captured by Kraven along with other Beyond employees.[24]

name: Addley
description: In the dossier that Kaylie Doran read about Palmer Addley, there was also an interview with her mother, where she said that he was born when she was 19, that she initially thought he might be autistic, that he had good grades at school but always ended. in trouble, that because of his job and that of her husband he was almost always alone and was very intelligent to the point that at 16 he already knew much more than his parents.[25]

name: Adele
description: Adele and her husband Burt welcomed the two surviving sons of his sister Anna to their ranch, accompanied by Logan fleeing two racketeers.[26]

name: Adrian
description: During the ethnic cleansing brought by The Bright, the infant Adrian and his mother were brought to safety by Agent Venom.[27]

name: Adrian
appearences: United States of Captain America Vol 1 1
description: Adrian was Aaron Fischer's boyfriend, whom he met in a field where Roxxon held the people forced to work on the construction of the new stadium, and whom Aaron helped free along with the other inmates.[28]

name: Adriana
description: Adriana was the daughter of Marta, a woman who met and started a relationship with Wilson Fisk when he tried to start a new life in Spain. Fisk became a father figure for Adriana and her brother Jaime, calling him "Uncle Wheelie". However, she and the rest of her family were slaughtered by the Hand and Lady Bullseye.[29]

name: Adrienne
description: Adrienne was a N.Y.U. film school student who filmed Dan Ketch while he was touching his bike.[30]

name: Adrienne
appearences: King in Black: Captain America Vol 1 1
description: Adrienne was a child who found herself in the midst of the onslaught of the Symbiote Dragons along with her cousin Dec and was saved by the intervention of Captain America, Falcon and Winter Soldier.[31]

name: Afan
description: Afan was killed along with all the other members of the Black Dawn Fighters during the assault on their base in Tikrit by the Punisher.[32]

name: Agama
description: Agama was one of the guards at Yoshida ancestral manor.[33]

name: Agami
description: Agami was one of Lord Shingen Harada's advisors within Clan Yashida.[34]

name: Agnes
description: Agnes and her sister Laura were visited by Mr. Cotton from the Welfare Bureau after receiving complaints about the smell and filth of the house. He threatened to call an exterminator on the rats and attempted to kill one himself, one named Caesar, who attacked and bit him back. After he killed the rat, the women were distraught and lead him to their clean cellar where they chained up Mr Cotton and fed him to the rest of the rats.[35]

name: Agnes
description: Mentions: Spirits of Vengeance #3

name: Aguinaga
description: Aguinaga was an El Paso Border Patrol detective. Together with federal agent Cassie Lathrop, he investigated a series of murders committed on the Mexican border involving the Angelica Rojas' Cartels and investigating an amnesiac Logan.[37]

name: Ahirn
description: Mentioned:Conan the Adventurer #7

name: Ahkbar
description: Father of nine, poor farmer Ahkbar was struck and possessed by the Shedu summoned by the Devourer of Souls.[10]

name: Ahmed
description: Ahmed was an Aqirian soldier; while he was on watch at night, a fellow soldier pointed out that the Moon was changing.[39]

name: Ahmet
description: Ahmet plotted to become king and murdered Jamal when he discovered him. After the old prophet's death, he and his guards attacked Conan and Keiv, but the fight was abruptly halted by Imhotep's destruction of the city-state.[40]

name: Ahmet
description: Mr. Ahmet was killed by the Jackal for leaking information of their movements to the Punisher.[41]

name: Aimes
description:
Aimes was the warden of Crossmore prison in England and asked why Deadpool was being held in his prison instead of being sent to the Raft where there was a more congeniable environment for a person of his characteristics.[42]
During an interview with Dr. Whitby, warden Aimes asks her if she will allow all of her patients to walk around in costume as Deadpool.[43]
Aimes intervened during Gerhardt's Cressmoor riot and blamed Deadpool for it. After that he made sure that Gerhardt could be released, not imagining that in reality who was released was in fact Deadpool.[44]

name: Akan
description: Akan was a warrior of the Ichiribu who first opposed Conan's offer to teach new methods of fighting.[45]

name: Akhmed
description: Akhmed was one of Sheik Ali Maksoud's men, who was called to investigate the attack of a werewolf in the tribe's camp.[46]

name: Akio
description: Akio was interrogated in the Ginza district of Tokyo by Wolverine and Rogue about Nabatone Yokuse.[47]

name: Akira
description: Akira was an Osaka police officer who was killed by Lady Deathstrike.[48]

name: Akiro
description: Akiro was one of a group of children who witnessed a dragon appear in the sky, headed to attack Tokyo.[49]

name: Akmit
description: Just arrived in the city, Conan stopped by the stables of Akmit, who recognized him as a caravan thief and knocked him down, selling him to a slave trader.[50]

name: Akreon
description: General Akreon was a born and bred Valusian, who loved civilization and despised Brule's Pictish culture. When he ventured with Kull, Brule and Ethias in southern Verulia looking for the amulet of Ka, he tried to steal the kingdom from Kull. First he murdered Ethias, faking a drowning, then struck Brule, who promptly warned Kull of the betrayal. Akreon was then brutally killed by his own king.[51]

name: Al
description: Al was one of the musicians who performed at the Coffee A Go-Go for Bobby Drake's birthday party.[52]

name: Al
description: Al and Rocky were caught during an attempted car theft by Hulk and Betty Ross. As the Hulk scared off the crooks, he began to change back into Bruce Banner. Taking advantage of this, Rocky took a shot at Bruce and they both fled away.[53]

name: Al
description: A short time later, Al was defeated by Clea when his gang assaulted her and Wong.[54]

name: Al
description: An MPDC officer, Al arrested the gang of robbers captured by the Black Knight.[55]

name: Al
description: Big Al was the owner of a Motorcycle Shop from which Peter Parker bought a motorcycle. Before buying it, Big Al told Peter that the bike was like a woman, he would never know if he wanted it if he hadn't tried it for a ride first.[56]

name: Al
description: Al was Mr. Devereaux's assistant for Lobster Man: The Movie.[57]

name: Al
description: Al was a former colleague of Janice Lincoln.[58]

name: Alan
description: During the fight between Omegex and Red Hulk, Alan radioed Kent who was in a helicopter asking for updates on what was happening.[59]

name: Albert
description: Albert and Ethel attended a lecture on yoga given by Chondu the Mystic.[60]

name: Albert
description: Albert and Barney spotted Kukulcàn's sphere of solar force moving fast across the night sky.[61]

name: Albert
description: Big Albert was a member of the Grady Gang, who was defeated by the Avenging Angel.[62]

name: Albert
description: Albert was a thug who confronted Tony MacDonald at the Eastside High School and sparked a random shooting.[63]

name: Albert
description:
Albert was an old serial killer who lived in the Everglades marshes. Entering the town of Sunville, Albert approached the young Billy Templeton and with an excuse kidnapped him, killed him and threw the body into the marshes. Blaming himself for his brother's disappearance, Skip went into the swamp to his research and was accidentally saved by Albert himself from the drowning, then took him to his home and there Skip discovered that Albert was guilty of his brother's disappearance and given the situation Albert he also held prisoner.[64]
Later, when Hulk set out to find the Templeton brothers, he found the culprit but Albert barked out that he did it to save them the children by handing them to God and taking them away from their families. Immediately after Albert managed to escape from the Hulk when there was Man-Thing's intervention and in the meantime trying to free himself, Skip set fire to Albert's house. Albert ran into the house and rescued Skip from the fire and took him to a boat where Skip tried to break free and both crashed into the water and there Albert was killed by an alligator.[65]

name: Albert
description: Albert was a federal agent and took Tito Mendez into their ranks even though he suspected that Tito's father had asked for his son to be integrated into the Federal Intelligence ranks as a move to infiltrate one of his men but Tito's father reassured him that he had done to keep him away from his work.[66]

name: Albert
description: Albert allowed Nick Fury to visit Valentina Allegra de Fontaine inside the BND offices in Berlin. Fontaine commented how much Albert resembled Eric Koenig asking if he was his son, but Fury clarified that it was in fact Albert.[67]

name: Albert
description: Albert was a security guard at the Andru Correctional Facility.[68]

name: Albescu
appearences: Black Panther: The Man Without Fear Vol 1 516
description: Albescu was a man in the Vlad Dinu crime family. Vlad ordered Albescu to create chaos in Hell's Kitchen but Black Panther learned about it and tried to force him to leave the city and after failing to convince him, threw him in a moving truck.[69]

name: Alby
description: Alby noticed Ellen Brandt coming back from the swamp.[70]

name: Aldo
description: General Aldo was little more than a Zingaran figurehead. Aldo was killed by Marshall Barabbus when he refused to sign the official decree for Santiar's execution.[71]

name: Aldo
description: Aldo was a young and dedicated lab assistant hired by Dr. Connors to remove any last trace of the Lizard's evil persona from his physiology. While experimenting with Connors' own DNA, Aldo inadvertently created the Lizard creature.[72]

name: Aldo
description: Aldo was one of the Madripoor crime bosses. After Tyger Tiger had Madripoor's crime bosses confronted to select who would work for her, he was the first to be killed by Kobus Van Holten who stabbed him from behind.[73]

name: Alec
description: Alec was ordered to alert the fire brigade and get a security team over the north end of the field of the London Heathrow Airport, following an explosion caused by the battle between Hurricane and Captain Britain.[74]

name: Alec
description: A member of Exchange, Alec was killed by the Punisher in North Creek.[75]

name: Alejo
description: Alejo was one of Robbie Reyes' coworkers at Canelo's Auto and Body.[76]

name: Aleshia
description: Aleshia defended the mutants from Kadril's accusations of killing Captain America during Onslaught.[77]

name: Alex
description: Alex interviewed Debbie Green's ex-fiancee Jason live on television.[78]

name: Alex
description: Alex was a journalist that worked for the Denver Post and reported on Captain Marvel getting a job at the local Observatory.[79]

name: Alex
appearences: King in Black: Planet of the Symbiotes Vol 1 2
description: During the symbiote assault on New York, he opposed the indications given by Hobie Brown by offending him by telling him that he was an important person and did not need his directives while the assault of the symbionts hit him firsthand becoming one of the people possessed by they.[80]

name: Alex
description: Alex was a guest man of the Resort Chapiteau and there he was put under mind control with a bracelet. In this way he was forced to kidnap a child, but Kate Bishop identified the place where the child was being held captive and freed her, also freeing Alex by destroying the bracelet that controlled him, and returned the child to her parents.[81]

name: Alexa
description: Alexa was a trainer with the Black Widow Ops Program. After Natasha easily defeated older Daria in a training fight, Alexa allowed her to go take a shower. He pretended to help Natasha escape the center to test her loyalty.[82]

name: Alexei
description:
Alexei was a government bureaucrat who came from Moscow to evaluate Province 13's usefulness.[83]
After visiting the facility, he decided to close it.[84]
Alexei eventually gave the order to delete every memory and record of Province 13.[85]

name: Alexi
description:
Alexi pushed Colonel Yuri Brevlov to destroy the Hulk at all costs.[86]
He even urged Brevlov to use the Uni-Disintegrator against him, despite possibly harming an innocent child whom the Green Goliath was protecting.[87]

name: Alexi
description:
Alexi was a former KGB agent who had been trained by the Winter Soldier. Many years later, Alexi reunited with Barnes in the gulag where he had been imprisoned and advised him by showing him the opponent he would have to face in the match that was being organized in the gulag.[88]
Alexi was later discovered to belong to the conspiracy that had Barnes extradited to Russia and imprisoned in Siberia.[89]

name: Alf
description: Alf was one of the Steyr Security Systems researchers who worked with Wonder Man.[90]

name: Alfred
description: Alfred was among the crowd who watched the Beast and Iceman perform in Washington Square Park.[91]

name: Alfred
description: Alfred was one of Lorenzo Jacobi's henchmen.[92]

name: Algie
description: Algie was a member of the rival gang of Red Fever who was called by Ernie after he got the tip from Scooter that Red Fever was in Riverdale and ultimately he clashed with the whole gang against the Punisher.[93]

name: Ali
description: Ali was the Head Warden of Tsavo East Reserve, Kenya. He helped Dai Thomas investigate the murder of Mister Conrad and poachers' activity.[94]

name: Alice
description: Alice was the owner of the town coffee shop in Cobbler's Roost.[95]

name: Alice
description: Alice was a nurse called by Jeryn Hogarth to treat Daniel Rand after the duel against the Steel Serpent.[96]

name: Alice
description: One night in the Greenwich Village, Alice and her family saw Spider-Man (Peter Parker) fighting against strange four-armed creatures.[97]

name: Alice
description: Bill and Alice were a couple who lived in the apartment where Puma collapsed from the roof due to the Black Cat's powers of bad luck.[98]

name: Alice
description: Alice, herself a psychopath, after the brainwashing she was made to believe to be the wife of George, and after he tried to attack her, she suffered a psychotic breakdown trying to kill Frank Castle that had just saved her.[99]

name: Alice
description: Alice was among the Genoshan mutates serving the President of Genosha. She apologized profusely when she dropped tray of food for Prodigal of the X-Patriots. The President forgave her.[100]

name: Alice
description: Alice witnessed the Zombie kidnap her friend Billy.[101]

name: Alice
description: Mentions: X-23 (Vol. 3) #10

name: Alice
description:
Alice was a teenager on the run from her mother. When her mother tried to bring her back to her house, they had a fight, and while Alice ran away from her, her mother was possessed by an alien symbiote, and together they attacked her, but she was saved by Elektra's intervention as Daredevil.[103]
Although Elektra managed to save Alice, unfortunately her mother under the complete control of the symbiote was killed by Typhoid Mary, also controlled by a symbiote.[104]
Elektra welcomed Alice, now an orphan like her, into her house after the death of her mother.[105]
Elektra tried to teach Alice how to fight and had her watch her knock out two henchmen from the Libris Crime Family.[106]
After training her, Elektra took Alice with her to a club she owned, used by Hell's Kitchen boss Butch Pharris for a party. When Pharris unleashed a masked man against Elektra, Alice collided with a henchman of Pharris, defeating him, and soon after she shot Elektra's opponent when he saw her in trouble, not knowing she was a member of the Hand.[107]

name: Alika
description: Alika was one of the evolved lycanthropes who was eventually defeated and killed Logan.[108]

name: Alisha
description:
Alisha was the bartender at the Bar with No Name in New York City. Conan met Alisha when he broke into Bar With No Name along with Magik.[109]
Alisha served at the Bar while Conan celebrated with the girls.[110]
Alisha told Rhino that in order to keep the Bar in that location, a big score had to be made that would keep the cops paid, and it would take four men to do it. Conan immediately volunteered.[111]

name: Alison
description: Alison was Theo's daughter. She was a very lively child and she played at home with her sister and their little dog disturbing her father while he watched television.[112]

name: Alison
description: As she was watching The Metamorphosis by Nadia Dornova in Broadway, Alison suddenly felt a little strange and disappeared in thin air.[113]

name: Alison
description: Allison was a member of Lila Cheney's staff. When Lila threw the mike at Dominic Solarz hitting him in the teata, Allison promptly handed Lila a new mike so she could continue her concert.[114]

name: Aliyah
description: Aliyah was the daughter of Kimura, a Black Panther sleeper agent based in Washington, D.C.. When a mysterious group of assassins set out on the trail of T'Challa's sleeping agents, they also targeted Kimura and after defeating her he was about to kill Aliyah and her father but they were saved thanks to the timely intervention of the Black Panther.[115]

name: Allen
description: Allen was accused of stealing from the father of his girlfriend Joyce Wilson, a wealthy jewelry collector, after having suddenly disappeared. Instead, Allen had been kidnapped by the real jewel thieves and was cleared and released by Namora.[116]

name: Allen
description: When his friend Gordon Langley returned from India, he told Allen that he had developed mental powers taught to him by Yogis. Initially skeptical, Allen was later frightened by how Langley made objects disappear and came to the conclusion that they did not exist and were simply creations of another person's mind, and in fact they too vanished.[117]

name: Allen
description: Dr. Allen visited Jack Russell after he was found unconscious on the beach.[118]

name: Allen
description: Allen was a baby boy who was about to be sacrificed by Margaret and her followers to the demon Ehrthold but was rescued by the Man-Thing intervention.[119]

name: Allen
description: Allen was the boyfriend of Clara Cooper, Nathan (Megaman) Cooper's ex-wife. When Nathan's nephew Caps Cooper went to Clara's house to warn her that his uncle was alive and was back, Allen slapped him loudly calling him a liar, but in turn he himself was beaten up by Megaman when he realized he moved on with his wife.[120]

name: Allen
description: Allen was a nurse working at the Mercy Hospital who was infected by a Dire Wraith and died when the alien emerged by his body.[121]

name: Allen
description: Allen was a neighbor and friend of Marsha Rosenberg and Owen Reece.[122]

name: Allen
description: Allen met Patsy Walker walking in Greenwich Village and asked her for an autograph.[123]

name: Allen
description: Allen was Marla Jameson's attorney.[124]

name: Allen
description: Allen was one of the people who became infected with a mysterious monster and made him become a furious and uncontrollable being by assaulting anyone he met until he confronted Captain Marvel who was easily knocked out by her without hurting him too much.[125]

name: Alma
description: Alma rented her Uptown top-floor apartment to Warren Worthington III.[62]

name: Almadovar
description: Almadovar was a mobster wanted by the Interpol and warring syndicates for a million dollar bounty. Sean Cassidy and Daniel Peyer attempted to capture him, but Deadpool managed to kill Almadovar first, thus ruining their career within Interpol.[127]

name: Almita
description: Almita was a Mexican girl who with her grandfather Horacio and a small group of people tried to emigrate to the United States by crossing the Chihuahuan Desert and stumbled upon while the High Evolutionary was terraforming the desert and almost trapping them in the jungle that was being created.[128]

name: Alonso
description: Alonso was Norah Winters' trusted hairdresser. When he was working on her in his hairdressing salon, even though he didn't quite agree with the cut she wanted, she got a message on her smartphone and ran out of the salon with Alonso yelling at her that he couldn't let her go in. those conditions.[129]

name: Alonzo
description: Alonzo was Senator Stewart Ward's driver.[130]

name: Alphonse
description: Alphonse was a member of the Humans Off Planet movement. He was killed by members of a gang while he was in a public bath to talk to an agent of General Urt.[131]

name: Amanda
description: Amanda was sold by James Johnsmeyer to his rival Wallace, as a prize for the Great Game.[132]

name: Amanda
description: Amanda was an SHN news anchor who reported on the nationwide protests about Sam Wilson taking the role of Captain America.[133]

name: Amar
description: Amar was an ex-pirate who had reformed and become a special adviser to the Singapore police. He promised to bring Gambit and Laura to Madripoor if they found and rescued a police informant.[134]

name: Amari
appearences: Captain America: Sentinel of Liberty Vol 2 1
description:
When Steve Rogers moved into a simple apartment on the Lower East Side to live a civilian life, he met his first neighbor. He was a little boy who lived in the apartment right in front of him and they introduced each other smiling, with the little boy introducing himself as Amari. Steve later taught Amari how to defend himself from bullies.[135]
While Steve was teaching Amari how to box to defend himself, the boy talked about a Forge he had heard from a power station from Germany, intriguing Steve who was investigating the origins of his shield leading to an elusive "Forge".[136]
Steve offered to take Amari to school, and when he told him he was no longer afraid of bullies thanks to what Steve had taught him.[137]

name: Amaryllis
description: Amaryllis was a vampire who in the company of Ian's uncle and another vampire attacked the boy and his friend Michelle in her father's shop where they went to retrieve the bag that Ian had hidden inside with the material to fight Ian's uncle who had become a vampire, but only Blade's intervention saved the boys who eliminated the vampires.[138]

name: Amber
description: Amber was Flash Thompson's latest flame.[139]

name: Amelia
description: Amelia was Emil Blonsky's favorite student in Duncan, whom he dedicated his last small piece of poetry before quitting the job.[140]

name: Ames
description: Ms. Ames was a nurse working at the hospital in Arizona where both Johnny Blaze and Roxanne Simpson were admitted. When Satan, in Linda Littletrees' body, went to the hospital in search of Blaze, she told him the number of the room where he was hospitalized but that she could not receive visitors.[141]

name: Aminique
description: Aminique was a friend of Jessica Carradine.[142]

name: Amir
appearences: Death of Doctor Strange: Blade Vol 1 1
description: Amir was a young vampire follower of Dahlia. He tried to annoy Sheriff Blade during a party called for the death of the Sorcerer Supreme and for the occasion dressed in a costume that resembled that of Doctor Strange.[143]

name: Amir
description: Amir was a former colleague of Shanna from the days she worked at the zoo. He enlisted Shanna's help to prevent a group of poachers from abducting baby orangutans in Borneo for sale on the black market.[144]

name: Amtower
description: Professor Amtower was a scientist from Nextin Pharmaceuticals, he waited in the car for a contact from the United Nations to reveal secrets of his company concerning the Super-Soldier Serum but that during the wait was killed inside the car to which it was set on fire.[145]

name: Amy
description:
Amy was Marc Spector's assistant for the Moon Knight Hollywood show.[146]
She lost her job when the show was canceled.[147]

name: Amy
description: Amy approached Jessica Jones during her investigation on Rick Jones, directing her to the bar Ultimate where Jones used to perform.[148]

name: Amy
description: Amy left her boyfriend after discovering he was a mutant.[149]

name: Amy
description: Amy was one of the passengers of the Diamond Porpoise cruise ship.[150]

name: Amy
appearences: Civil War II: Choosing Sides Vol 1 6
description: Amy is a local of Point Pleasant, Ohio. She was the daughter of the county's sheriff. Amy was friends with Ulysses Cain since grade school and had become each other's confidante.

name: Anak
description: Anak was a warrior of the Ichiribu who was entrusted with guarding Emwaya. He died in the catacombs beneath the Lake of Death, killed by the last golden serpent.[45]

name: Analie
description: Analie was John Kowalski's Polish girlfriend who owned a pharmacy to which John had donated a dress. John himself found Analie's body, or what remained of her since he had recognized her thanks to that dress, in the rubble of his pharmacy following a bombing by the Nazi forces.[152]

name: Anatoli
description: Anatoli was a boy who was taken to the Neverlab in Earth Orbit, and was the fist to meet the Hulk inside Neverlab.[153]

name: Anaxor
description: Anaxor was probably the misborn offspring of man and baboon, who was kept by Rotath as a pet. Challenging Conan, he was swiftly strangled to death by the Cimmerian in chains.[154]

name: Anders
description: Officer of the G2 [[United States Secret Service (Earth-616)|secret service , Anders believed that the astronaut Rusty Lewis had been replaced by a green skinned alien when he returned from his trip to the Moon. To prove this Anders traveled on the moon himself not finding any alien and on his return his face turned green too, but fortunately Lewis reassured him that the color would return to normal after 24 hours.[155]

name: Anders
description: Anders was one of the guards at the Vault, who warned Warden Eric Jzemlico of a bad problem in the Vault's B.E.M. wing.[156]

name: Anders
description: Upon Alfred Anders's death, Captain America showed up for condolences to his wife by telling her that he had fought during the war with her husband. Mrs Anders, having nearly lost her sight by now, did not recognize Cap of her and therefore was amazed that he had fought with her husband, as Alfred had fought during the Second World War and all of her old comrades had died. In fact she would have wanted a funeral for Alfred with the pallbearers and men in uniform, but it was not possible precisely because by now there were no longer any of those soldiers still alive, but to do that Cap volunteered himself and alone took Alfred's coffin to the cemetery.[157]

name: Andre
appearences: Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 1 105
description: Andre was a man who was talking with Joy Meachum at a country club. She became distracted when she saw Danny Rand walking by and brushed him off to go talk with Danny.[158]

name: André
description: André killed the three nameless guerrillas who stole the amulet of Damballah.[159]

name: André
description: André was having a drink with Janet van Dyne when she received a mute call from Henry Pym.[160]

name: Andrei
description: Andrei was a soldier who was killed by Nikolas' cell in Province 13.[161]

name: Andrei
description: Andrei was a bartender at the Century Bar in West Hollywood, working directly for Yegor Ivanov.[162]

name: Andrew
description: Andrew was the manager of Kimberly Dee during her modeling career.[163]

name: Andrew
description: Mentions: Spider-Woman (Vol. 7) #3

name: Andreyivich
description: Captain Andreyivich was ordered to pick up the Crimson Dynamo with his submarine, although he disapproved of his witch-hunts instigated by forces within the Russian government. When the Champions attacked and defeated the Crimson Dynamo and his mercenaries, Andreyivich was eventually forced to shoot and kill Alexi Bruskin to defend his ship from the commissar's suicidal bombing attempt.[166]

name: Andropolus
description: Andropolus witnessed the attack of the Cyclops (A-Chiltarian Robot) and was questioned by Hank Pym and Janet van Dyne about the incident, who led them to George who was another witness.[167]

name: Andy
description: Andy was a member of the rival gang of Red Fever who was called by Ernie after he got the tip from Scooter that Red Fever was in Riverdale and ultimately he clashed with the whole gang against the Punisher.[93]

name: Angel
description:
Angel was a barman who worked for Nestor. He announced Logan's arrival to his boss.[168]
He also introduced Cassie Lathrop to his boss.[169]
He then closed the bar to let them chat alone.[170]
Angel was told by Nestor to get whatever he thought they could need to tend to Angelica.[171]

name: Angel
description: Angel was a diamond courier who briefly dated King Cobra upon his escape from the Raft.[172]

name: Angel
description: Angel was a Mexican man involved in drug trafficking but was discovered by corrupt Mexican soldiers who riddled him and his girlfriend Carla with blows. However, Carla was saved by the intervention of the Silver Surfer who, however, was unable to save Angel.[173]

name: Angel
description: Angel was a friend of Beto, on whom he had a crush.[174]

name: Angela
description: Angela was sent by the voodoo priest Rene Giscard to lure Blade into a trap to kill him, but although Blace initially believed the woman's falsehoods later Blade managed to kill both Giscard and Angela's brother, the Taker of Heads, and after having her left alive, she tried to shoot Blade behind him but he hit her with his sword leaving her to die in the flames of Giscard's house.[175]

name: Angela
description: Angela was saved by Paul Stacy from a building on fire.[176]

name: Angelina
description: Angelina was a little girl who, despite the efforts of Spider-Man (Peter Parker), was about to die due to the accidental explosion of a nearby cooling-machine full of Freon. She and Spidey were eventually spared by Death and brought back to life.[177]

name: Angelique
description: CBNC reporter Angelique interviewed Mr. Stark at the Hotel Alpine.[178]

name: Angelique
description: Angelique was rescued from her brutal husband by Frenzy.[179]

name: Angie
description: Angie was one of the hoodlums who attempted to harass the Thing in Central Park.[180]

name: Angie
appearences: All-Winners Squad: Band of Heroes Vol 1 2
description: Angie was Martin Goodman's secretary at Timely Comics. She was ordered by Martin to contact his nephew Stanley to write new comic stories.[181]

name: Ann
description: Ann received the news from the press conference where Trapster publicly confessed to have killed Joey Z, framing Spider-Man for murder.[182]

name: Anna
description: Anna noticed that Rose suddenly began to shiver as Robert Drake was passing nearby.[183]

name: Anna
description: Anna was a store clerk who just ignored Maxwell Dillon.[184]

name: Anna
description: Anna was the Smart House's housemaid.[185]

name: Anna
description:
Anna was the wife of Elias, a friend of Logan's from the Prohibition period. She died of consumption leaving four children in the care of her husband. Two years after his death, his daughter Vicky also fell ill with her own illness.[186]
After the death of Elias on the run from the criminals, Logan took his surviving children from to the ranch of Adele, Anna's sister, and discovered that upon Anna's death, Adele had suggested that Elias take the children to her.[26]

name: Anna
description:
Anna was the administrator of the orphanage from where Anthony Stark was adopted.[187]
He gave to him the Amanda Armstrong's file.[188]

name: Anna
description: Anna was the girlfriend of Kevin Schumer.[189] Once, she was sharing a sandwich in Prospect Park in Brooklyn and chatting lightly about super heroes with Kevin when he got a call from KSHOOM and was forced to leave, leaving Anna alone.[190]

name: Anneli
appearences: Jane Foster & the Mighty Thor Vol 1 1
description: While on a patrol with Roz Solomon in a New York park, in the crowd Jane Foster, with the powers of the Valkyrie, spotted Anneli among the park goers who would die a minute later of cardiac arrest by viewing her entire past life. After her death, the Valkyrie accompanied Anneli's soul into the beyond.[191]

name: Annie
description:
Annie was a DC-10 pilot who transported the X-Men from Japan to Canada.[192]
After a diverted landing at Calgary International Airport, she later took them back in American airspace.[193]

name: Annie
description: Annie was a young mother who was possessed by the Amulet of Kalmari.[194]

name: Annie
description: Annie was a cashier from Baker City who was saved from a robber by Vegas.[195]

name: Annie
description: Annie sensed that someone had entered her apartment and intimated that she was about to call the cops when she realized it was Kerry and asked her when she could use her food all for herself.[196]

name: Antoinette
description: Antoinette was one of the many Paris residents who were turned to stone by Mokk.[197]

name: Antonia
description: Hammerhead's sister, Antonia's life was saved by the Lifeline Tablet.[198] She had a son that joined his uncle's gang.[199]

name: Antonio
description: Mr. Antonio was contacted by Norman Osborn to obtain "Medical Specimens" and once located he reported to Norman the merchants were asking for $400,000 a piece.[200]

name: Anya
description: Anya was a girl Karma met at a music fair and fell in love with. When Karma learned that she had been brought into the woods by a boy, thinking that she was in danger she ran to her aid, but Anya still knew how to defend herself but thanked Karma for running to her aid and renewed their new relationship.[201]

name: Ara
description: Ara was a Tabissara mercenary who shot down an Ice Harrier.[202]

name: Archibald
description: Sergeant Archibald was the leader of the Vill-Kill Korps.[203]

name: Arjun
description:
Minor Appearances: A.X.E.: Judgment Day #3
Referenced: A.X.E.: Judgment Day #4, A.X.E.: Judgment Day #6

name: Arkhan
description: Arkhan was one of the hillmen who followed Conan after he killed their chief Yusef.[1]

name: Arkhaurus
description: Queen Ialamis' foremost advisor, Lord Arkhaurus allied with Baron Sabaninus of Korveka to overthrow Queen Ialamis and eventually annex Khauran to Koth. When the baron's plot was eventually uncovered by Conan and his allies, Arkhaurus was killed.[21]

name: Arlene
description: A friend of Portia Clennon, Arlene was murdered by Gino Ferzini.[206]

name: Arman
description: Arman was one of Farnoq Dahn's soldiers assigned to pilote a Mandroid given to him by the CIA to stamp out the rebel uprising in Trans-Sabal. After being defeated by the Hulk and the Pantheon, he reported to Farnoq Dahn of the assault suffered by a giant green monster.[207]

name: Armand
appearences: Wolverine: The Amazing Immortal Man & Other Bloody Tales Vol 1 1
description: Armand brought Olga to Lydia to have her baby.[208]

name: Armand
description: Armand was the owner and operator of Café Muschio. He asked the Kingpin for help after his sister-in-law, Sonia, was kidnapped.[209] In return for rescuing Sonia from Janus Jardeesh, the Kingpin's Henchmen later asked Armand to deliver pastries to an apartment building on the corner of Broadway and Bond Street in NoHo, which also happened to be a secret S.H.I.E.L.D. listening post known as the Mole Hill. Armand died when the bomb within the box of treats detonated, killing the entire S.H.I.E.L.D. team in the process.[210]

name: Armando
description: Armando told Kerry that his boxes of clothes that he had left in his apartment telling him they would only be there for two weeks were still there.[196]

name: Arne
description:
Arne was an oil rig worker under Brom's supervision.[211]
He was rescued by Brom when the platform exploded.[211]

name: Arni
appearences: Giant-Size Chillers Featuring Curse of Dracula Vol 1 1
description: Gretchin's son, Arni was bitten and killed by Dracula.[212]

name: Arnie
description: Arnie was one of Lorenzo Jacobi's drug dealers.[92]

name: Arnie
description: Arnie was a body builder who was defeated by Daredevil.[213]

name: Arnie
description: Arnie and Fletcher were two workmen authorized by Raymond Sikorski to find and confiscate the circuitry used by the Vision in the Avengers Mansion.[214]

name: Arnie
description: Arnie was one of the baggage handlers who saw Mr. Fixit's footprints from under the plane.[215]

name: Arnold
description: Arnold was a doctor in the Queens County Hospital.[216]

name: Arnold
description: Arnold was one of Electro's henchmen who helped him escape from a NYPD paddy wagon.[217]

name: Arnold
description: Arnold was a member of the Gorankians of the Savage Land who helped Felicity. After the Roxxon "Pangean Horizon" oil rig incident, Felicity told him to go to the beach with her crew and check on the turtle nest and immediately warn her if she was in danger from oil.[218]

name: Arnoldus
description: Arnoldus was a Norwegian fisherman who worked on Sven's fishing vessel and suffered the same fate as the crew of the fishing vessel after Sven was possessed by Surtur.[219]

name: Arthog
description: Arthog was the slave master on board the Lemurian pirate craft which rescued and enslaved Kull when he escaped from Atlantis.[220]

name: Arthur
description: Sebastian Scrogg has been trying to create a potion of immortality for years. He shelters a fugitive, Arthur, because he will have to put up with whatever he makes him do, and however he treats him. Arthur assist Sebastian however he can. Eventually, Sebastian realizes that Redwood trees are practically immortal, and using sap from said tree, he finally succeeds. Before he can drink the potion, Arthur kills him, and drinks it himself. He becomes immortal by growing roots and effectively becoming a tree.[221]

name: Arthur
description:
Arthur and Rusty created the Hulk robot in the engineer plant on the grounds of Maryland Institute of Technology.[222]
They publicly confessed they had built a computerized replica of the popular character, which somehow then ran out of control.[223]

name: Arthur
description: Arthur witnessed the Cosmic Hulk leaping from building to building.[224]

name: Arthur
appearences: X-Men: Children of the Atom Vol 1 1
description:
Arthur was an Anti-Mutant Militia affiliate.[225]
He gave Chad and Ruben a high-powered rifle to kill Hank McCoy.[226]
Arthur then introduced Chad to Mr. Metzger.[227]
Arthur agreed to be tested for a transformation project.[228]
He then began the transformation process.[229]
Arthur was eventually confronted and killed by Magneto.[230]

name: Artie
description: Artie worked in the town morgue and examined the body of Adina Malcolm's father confirming that he had been killed by a vampire.[231]

name: Artyom
description: Artyom was one of the thugs who murdered the Crime Master.[232]

name: Arvis
description:
Arvis was a police officer from Lynchburg who arrested Johnny Blaze.[233]
He was forced by James Strahorn to persecute Blaze.[234]

name: Asher
description: Dean Asher welcomed Johnny Storm and Wyatt Wingfoot to the Metro College.[235]

name: Astreas
description: Astreas was a normal human. He was a historian, chronicler and probably a philosopher. Astreas reported the events happened in Khauran. He had gotten a correspondence with Alcemides of Nemedia, and probably Alcemides used some of Astreas' informations to write his Nemedian Chronicles. Astreas was really surprised from the changes happened from Constantius arrival in Khauran. He asked himself if the Queen was possessed by a demon, and was quite sure that Conan wasn't dead but rode at the flank of Olgerd Vladislav and his Zuagirs. Astreas also spoke to Marcios, a soldier, who was sure that the Queen was a witch and that Taramis was alive but imprisoned. Astreas went to live in a camp of tents, some miles outside Khauran, and from there sent his letters using carrier-pigeons.[236]

name: Asuka
description: Asuka was Miguel Santos' former girlfriend.[237]

name: Attalus
description: Attalus was a normal human. He was a soldier and was one of the men who helped Marcios in freeing Taramis.[236]

name: Atwell
description: The original Human Torch saved Atwell's business from a gasoline Syndicate.[238][239]

name: Audrey
description: Audrey was J. Jonah Jameson's and Marla Madison's housemaid.[240]

name: Augie
description: Augie and his partner were defeated by Captain America when they tried to loot councilman Andrew Bolt's office.[241]

name: Austin
description: Austin was Jonathan Caesar's assistant.[242]

name: Auxier
appearences: Shang-Chi and the Ten Rings Vol 1 4
description: Auxier was forcibly robbed of his design by the corrupt businessman Mr. Kwok. Then, Auxier hired Shen Kuei to take back his designs and in the presence of Shen Kuei, the frightened Kwok immediately surrendered by giving Shen Kuei his laptop password to retrieve Auxier's design and return it to him.[243]

name: Ava
description: Ava was a Wonder Man who spotted him at the Taco Loco restaurant.[244]

name: Ava
description: Ava was an evolved lycanthrope who was helped by Logan.[108]

name: Babe
description: Babe was one of Pete London's henchmen, who mistook Daredevil for an enemy and tried to attack him, but he was quickly rebuked by Pete London.[1]

name: Babette
description: Babette was Strong Guy's personal masseuse.[2]

name: Babs
description: Babs was one of the many jet-set girls Tony Stark went with to forget Pepper Potts. During one of their appointments Tony told her that she had a surprise for her, and while she thought it was a jewel, a fur or a perfume Tony instead took her to visit his factory that was now to be completed.[3]

name: Babyface
description: Prince and Babyface were two homeless people arguing over being able to use a cardboard box from a refrigerator to sleep in, but after seeing a figure prowling around they got scared and decided to share the crate.[4]

name: Bailey
description: Doctor Bailey was a physician and scientist from the Beyond Corporation who treated Ben Reilly after the latter was bitten by Morbius and to which Director Danger asked if there would be any implications to study in the case of hybridization between Ben Reilly and the bite. of the vampire.[5]

name: Baird
description: Doctor Baird assisted Carol Danvers at the Virginia Mason Hospital when she was hospitalized for alcohol abuse.[6]

name: Baker
description: Agent Baker was a guard at the prison where Daredevil was incarcerated. During the onslaught of Knull's symbiotes on the prison, Daredevil convinced Baker to let him out of his cell to fight the symbiotes.[7]

name: Balbao
description: Balbao was a large man very loyal to Nafertari who attacked Conan convinced to protect her, however despite his bulk he was defeated and stunned by Conan.[8]

name: Balin
description: Mr. Balin was attacked by the Night Terror in the intelligence station where he escaped from.[9]

name: Ballard
description: Ballard survived the terrorist attack on Rome's Da Vinci Airport despite being wounded by Giancarlo Gelberto. Upon his recovery, Ballard tried to avenge the death of his girlfriend during the attack, but failed to shoot him, on the other hand thought about eliminating Gelberto after which he also killed Ballard because he had discovered that he was a former partner of Gelberto and had participated to the elimination of Gelberto's rival George Stone.[10]

name: Ballard
description: Mr. Ballard was a smuggling mobster who was defeated by the Punisher.[11]

name: Bamf
description: Bamf was Elsie's family dog, who she killed and skinned after she was possessed by the Carnage symbiote.[12]

name: Bank
description: Doctor Bank was among the members of a board of psychiatrists who had to decide on the recovery of Stan Carter and thus be able to release him at liberty. Bank was doubtful about the release and endorsed the positions of Dr. Kalish also ironic about the situation.[13]

name: Bankhead
description: Mrs. Bankhead sought out the help of Carl Burgass when her husband, Paul Bankhead was sent an extortion note from Jim Peterson. She and Carl went back to her house and found Paul had been kidnapped.[14]

name: Bannister
description:
The daughter of the C.I.A. agent Jeff Bannister who was cured of her leukimea thanks to medicines obtained from Krakoan flowers after her father collaborated with Wolverine to defeat the Flower Cartel criminal organization.[15]
Afterward, Wolverine gave the little girl a Deadpool finger telling her to keep it in the fridge and that he would allow her to pass the Gateways to Krakoa.[16]

name: Bao
description: Bao was an android nurse who raised Coldmoon and Dragonfire.[17]

name: Barabbus
description: Marshall Barabbus was a cruel Aquilonian in charge of Sadoria's security. When his tyrannical rule was overthrown by Conan and Delmurio, he was beaten to death by the exiled children of war.[18]

name: Barb
description: Barb was once kidnapped by Count Nefaria and taken away atop a Manhattan building, until he was confronted by Whizzer, and she then managed to escape.[19]

name: Barb
description: Barb and Sandy witnessed the Thunderbolts pursue the Rat Pack through the concrete canyons of Mid-Manhattan.[20]

name: Barb
description: Some time later, she was told to check Tony Stark's phone, which her boyfriend saw in a catalog.[21]

name: Barb
description: Barb was Norman Osborn's secretary at Oscorp. When she heard screams inside Norman's office, due to Peter Parker's outburst that he thought Norman was manipulating him, she rushed to Norman's office door, but he reassured her that everything was ok.[22]

name: Barbara
description: Barbara was the fiancée of the rich geologist John Saxton and when he suspected that Barbara had an affair with his young brother Don, he was consumed with jealousy, plotting to kill them both by exploiting his knowledge of geology but when the truth emerged and he discovered that Barbara actually loved him and not his brother he tried to make up for it by remaining himself killed in the trap he had devised for them.[23]

name: Barbara
description: Barbara was friends with Nan Brown and Hedy Wolfe.[24]

name: Barbara
appearences: Power Man and Iron Fist Vol 1 55
description: Barbara was a girl who advertised Borman Motors at the New York Auto Show in collaboration with Power Man.[25]

name: Barbara
description:
Barbara was a security guard at the Metropolitan Art Museum and during the night shift they discovered Spider-Man's presence in the museum.[26]
They tried to stop him thinking he was committing a crime not knowing instead that he had just finished fighting with Diablo.[27]

name: Barbara
appearences: World War Hulk: Front Line Vol 1 1
description: Barbara interviewed a financial expert in "The Money Analyst" TV studio about the financial implications for a possible New York evacuation.[28]

name: Barenzo
description: Barenzo was a freak show slaver who purchased Alhambra to exhibit her. He was eventually killed by the Man-Bats of Ur-Xanarrh who were looking for the bird-woman.[29]

name: Barkley
description: Mr. Barkley is an associate with M.M. Madison. Patsy Walker worked as a junior clerk for him one summer.[30]

name: Barnaby
description: Minor Appearance: Marvel Tsum Tsum #2

name: Barnacle
description: Barnacle was a member of Wicked Wally Wuggens' gang who was confronted and defeated by Excalibur after trying to escape from Crossmoor Prison.[33]

name: Barnes
description: Professor Barnes was skeptical about Paul Harper's theory of the time dimensions.[34]

name: Barnes
description: Mister Barnes was a member of Captain McKenzie's crew aboard the Oracle icebreaker.[35]

name: Barnes
description: Barnes was Dean Swaybrick's butler.[36]

name: Barney
description: Barney and Albert spotted Kukulcàn's sphere of solar force moving fast across the night sky.[37]

name: Barney
description: Barney was a member of the Crime-Wave criminal organization. When Willie Lincoln unintentionally ended up in Crime-Wave's secret lair, Barney was about to eliminate him but they discovered that Willie was blind and unable to identify them and so they let him go without hurting him.[38]

name: Barney
description: Barney and Harvey chased the Ghost Rider on the Long Island Expressway for having exceeded the speed limit, but he eventually managed to escape them.[39]

name: Barry
description: Barry was Mary-Ann Travers' boyfriend.[40]

name: Barry
description: Barry's mother Beatrice married Joshua Walker after the death of his first wife Dorothy. He attended the wedding of Patsy Walker to Daimon Hellstrom.[41]

name: Barry
description: Barry was a newscaster who interviewed General Ulysses R. Chapman.[42]

name: Barry
appearences: Free Comic Book Day 2021: Spider-Man/Venom Vol 1 1
description: Barry was a security guard who after being tied up by Bushwacker swears to his colleague that he had searched him at the entrance.[43]

name: Barry
description: Barry was Mr. Fixit's private chauffeur. As Fixit explained to the rest of the New Fantastic Four what was happening in Las Vegas inside Barry's limo, Barry suddenly braked as a multitude of demon-possessed people on the road attempted to attack them.[44]

name: Bart
description: Bart was Ellie's boyfriend.[45]

name: Bartholomew
description: Buddy Bartholomew's father was the reason Buddy stayed in New York and didn't move to Krakoa.[46]

name: Basaq
description: Basaq was an elder of the Kobremi Brotherhood. When Conan showed up to avenge the death of the Great Khan's children, he tried to escape throughout the city with Hassan I'Shammar, but he was eventually killed by the Cimmerian.[47]

name: Bashat
description: Bashat was a Meroan soldier who watched over the city gate.[48]

name: Basir
description: Basir had been employed by the Beyond Corporation for only a week when he was captured by Kraven along with other Beyond employees.[49]

name: Batu
description: Batu was a ranger in Tsavo East, Kenya. He worked under the command of Ali.[50]

name: Bawka
appearences: Ka-Zar: Lord of the Savage Land Vol 1 1
description: Bawka and Vanga, two Fall People farmers, were tending the harvest for their tribe when they were attacked by a diseased T-Rex but luckily they were rescued by Matthew Plunder and Zabu.[51]

name: Baxter
description: Baxter loaned money to Pete Roark in order to let him buy cattle, but made sure his herd was stolen in order to make Roark unable to pay him back, so he set the Roark home ablaze as the land was more valuable to him. Then, Baxter and his men planned an ambush on the Ringo Kid, but he was aware of the plan and allowed himself to be locked up, only to escape and confront Baxter again, also proving Baxter's crimes and making the sheriff arrest him.[52]

name: Baxter
description: Mr. Baxter was the father of Buzz Baxter. When one day Buzz brought his report card home his mother advised him not to show it to his father because he was still shaving.[53]

name: Baxter
description: Mrs. Baxter was the mother of Buzz Baxter. When one day Buzz brought his report card home his mother advised him not to show it to his father because he was still shaving.[53]

name: Baxter
description: Mr. Baxter managed to stop an alien invasion announced by the giant Gigantus building and piloting Ulvar, a mechanical fake alien even more gigantic of Gigantus so putting him on the run and giving up its invasion plans.[54]

name: Baxter
description: Chief Baxter was the Chief of Operations at Mys-Tech. Not wanting Mullarkey to take command of the operations, she pretended to give him a bodyscreen to protect him from strange energies he would encounter, but instead it was a natural death simulator that killed him so that she took part in the operations instead of him.[55]

name: Baxter
description: Baxter was the dog of a neighbor of the Connors and he used to poop in their garden. At one point it was obvious that Baxter had been devoured by the Lizard but it was discovered that he was alive and well and that the Lizard had only broken his leash.[56]

name: Baxter
description: Baxter was one of the police officers selected to be part of the Anti-Spider Squad strongly demanded by Mayor Jameson prepared solely to capture Spider-Man.[57]

name: Baxter
description: Baxter was a member of the Raft staff who was present when Juggernaut destroyed it by picking up Kuurth's hammer. He was stuck under the rubble and was saved thanks to colleague Webber and warden John Walker.[58]

name: Baz
description: Baz was the uncle of Eden Fesi that he visited in his homeland in Australia before embarking on a mission to reassure himself that he had not been attacked by the Symbiote Dragons of Knull.[59]

name: Bazil
description: In Northern Turan, Bazil was slain by the hand of Nergal.[60]

name: Bazz
description:
Buzz was contacted by Lucien to set up a scenario to make Emma's kidnapping credible and obtain a ransom from her father Winston Frost.[61]
After Lucien killed Troy, Bazz wanted to back down but was heavily scolded by Lucien who forced him to continue his work.[62]
Bazz was the only one of Lucien's gang not to die in the shooting between the various members after Emma had filled their minds with doubts and suspicions, but still Emma made sure that he handcuffed himself for the arrival of the police.[63]

name: Bea
description: Bea was one Tony Stark's dates.[64]

name: Bea
description:
Bea was a circus performer in Canon City who came across the Hulk.[65]
She pleaded the circus owner to help him.[66]
During the battle against Ant-Man, Iron Man and the Wasp, Bea was eventually rescued by the Hulk himself.[67]

name: Beacher
description: Agent Beacher was a security guard who worked for Charles Worthy.[68]

name: Beatrice
description: Beatrice was a bearded lady who persuaded Deadpool to help the people of Gibsonton.[69]

name: Bebo
description: Bebo was an armored car robber who was confronted and defeated by Spider-Man.[70]

name: Beck
description: Mentions: Marvel Comics Presents #48

name: Beck
description: Mentions: Iron Man (Vol. 4) #2

name: Becky
description: Becky was one of Peter Parker's students at Midtown High School.[75]

name: Beekman
description: Dr. Beekman was a member of Mercy General Hospital staff, and he had already received a few complaints about Tony Marcheyk's attitude, so he immediately dismissed him when he got into a fight with Flash Thompson.[76]

name: Bell
description: Dr. Bell asked Dr. Hoffsteader the story about Barry Bauman.[77]

name: Bell
description:
The X-Men teleported to Australia coming close to Eva's house, and she ran to hug her mother and introduced her to the X-Men.[78]
When the Avengers reached the X-Men in Australia to arrest and interrogate Scott and Emma, Eva's mom feared the Hulk would enter her home. When the X-Men left, Eva told her mother not to tell where she was, and her mother replied that she didn't actually know where she was.[79]

name: Belle
description: Belle was a Long Island native who became a barkeep in Lowtown.[80]

name: Beltane
description:
Chancellor Exchequer Beltane was Latveria's chief of finance.[81]
Beltane was confronted and defeated by Iron Man.[82]

name: Belvedere
description: Mr. Belvedere was Heidi's pet cat.[83]

name: Ben
description: Ben and Spade were two thugs who were knocked out by a living statue.[84]

name: Ben
description: During the Salem witch trials in the 18th Century, Ben saved Sarah from the witch-hunters. After Sarah got in an accident, he revealed that he knew she wasn't a witch because he is one.[85]

name: Ben
description: Ben was a fan of the Human Torch.[86]

name: Ben
description: Ben was at Yancy Street when he was saved by Spider-Man from being forever trapped in the Negative Zone.[87]

name: Ben
description: Ben was one of the policemen who arrested the suspected murderers in Redemption Valley.[88]

name: Ben
description: A native of Florida, Ben was among the first victims of the hunters of Vellus-Kar when they arrived on Earth via the Nexus of All Realities.[89]

name: Ben
description: Ben was a captain of the Washington police, he tried to apprehend Spider-Man in front of Capitol Building.[90]

name: Benehl
description: Mr. Benehl was the curator of the Museum of Egyptian Antiquities.[91]

name: Benetton
description: Benetton was one of Taskmaster's trainees whom he unleashed to flush out and eliminate Tyrone McQuaid after McQuaid dared to flee Taskmaster Academy. The Falcon intervened to defend McQuaid and defeated all of Taskmaster's students.[92]

name: Benitez
description: Mr. Benitez was a plumber who fixed Robbie Reyes's house even though Reyes had no money to pay. Reyes later paid Benitez after winning some money in street races.[93]

name: Benjamin
description:
Benjamin and his brother Takeshi robbed a bank during the Daken-led EMP but were in turn robbed by Kobus Van Holten.[94]
After Tyger Tiger had Madripoor's crime bosses confronted to select who would work for her, Takeshi survived, while Benjamin was killed by Param Mishra.[95]

name: Benjamin
description:
The mother of aspiring tennis champion Maya Benjamin was a very haughty person.[96]
After Maya's semi-final defeat to Mill Collins, her mother tried in vain to make her understand that a defeat wasn't all that important and that tennis wasn't everything in her life.[97]

name: Benjamin
appearences: United States of Captain America Vol 1 2
description: Benjamin was an activist who cared about Nichelle Wright's well-being and along with a group of activists who supported her, he was in charge of helping and hiding her after she was accused of domestic terrorism.[98]

name: Benny
description: Benny was a fellow inmate who helped the Melter build a new Melting Ray MK II in exchange for freedom, but, as soon as the weapon worked, the Melter turned on his companion and escaped by himself.[3]

name: Benny
description: A few years later, Benny became one of Jigsaw's henchmen who were defeated by the Spider-Man and the Punisher.[99]

name: Benny
description: Benny was a policeman from Washington, D.C. and together with his partner they tried to stop the two Plug-Uglies robbers but Benny was hit with Flame's weapon that wrapped him in flames.[100]

name: Benny
description: Benny was a penicillin smuggler that was captured by Miss Patriot.[101]

name: Benny
description: A member of the Spiderlings, Benny argued with his coworkers, saying he was okay with battling the Avengers since they wouldn't kill them. He was easily defeated by the heroes.[102]

name: Benta
description: Benta alerted Chibi that two trespassers were on approach and they were Rick Jones's accomplices.[103]

name: Bentley
description: Bentley was the assistant to Simon Drudd who thought the ageing serum was for everyone, but Drudd betrayed Bentley and locked him the freezer when Drudd wanted the serum all to himself. He was later freed by the police and recounts the events to them, however they did not believe him. Bentley leaves proclaiming what happened was probably for the best.[104]

name: Benton
description: He was the judge of Red Dog and was forced under threat from Ace Dorman to award Bull Clanton as sheriff of Red Dog instead of Blaze Carson who had been accused of murder.[105]

name: Benton
description: Sergeant-Major Benton was one of those in charge of the arrest and transport of Juggernaut and was ordered by his superior that the prisoner was constantly sedated.[106] A reference to John Benton from Doctor Who.

name: Benton
description: Mr. Benton was the father of Andi, aka Mania, who was killed by Jack O'Lantern.[107]

name: Benway
description:
Dr. Benway was a scientist who worked for the Red Skull. He was given the body of Diamondback on which he was to inject an experimental formula.[108]
After injecting Rachel with the experimental serum, she had a violent reaction and freed herself by throwing away Dr. Benway who got up holding a gun but Rachel disarmed him easily.[109]

name: Bernard
description: Bernard helped Arcade kidnap Spider-Man, the Black Cat, and Michael Dennager.[110]

name: Bernardo
description: After the debacle with the Hulk, Colonel Bernardo gave Wolverine one more chance to prove his abilities before he relinquished command to his replacement.[111]

name: Bernie
description: Bernie was a soldier stationed at Cape Canaveral, he and his comrades responded to an attack of Quasimodo at the base.[112]

name: Bernie
description: Bernie was a kid who witnessed Spider-Man fight the Tarantula on the Jackal's bus.[113]

name: Berry
description: Berry treated Red Hawk's disease at the request of Apache Kid.[114]

name: Bert
description: Bert was the owner of one of Deadpool's favorite bar, which was attacked and raided by Black Tom's mercenaries.[115]

name: Bert
description: Bert was one of the inhabitants of the village in British Columbia where Logan established himself with Rose O'Hara. He ended up respecting Logan as he got to know him, and together with his friend Fred, defended Logan when Cookie Malone started to insult him.[116]

name: Bertha
description: Bertha was Homer's wife, who became paranoid after receiving genuine diamonds from Ozarr.[117]

name: Bertha
description: Big Bertha was killed by Clea while she was being held in the same cell.[118]

name: Bertie
description: Bertie was one of the hostage takers who were confronted and defeated by Excalibur.[119]

name: Bertrallo
description: Bertrallo was the tavern owner who treated Yadlo's nose wound previously inflicted by Baron Vjerzak. The fearful Bertrallo revealed to the baron's thugs where Conan was resting, and conversely, after the Cimmerian killed them all, told him where the baron's house was located.[120]

name: Bess
description: Bess was Reverend Stryker's secretary. She roused him from writing one of his sermons when F.B.I. documents on the X-Men arrived, and later reminded him of his TV interview with John Cheever.[121]

name: Bessy
description: Bessy was Carlton Kilgore's limo driver. Some months before Kade made his move, he approached Bessie. Due to Carlton having harassed her, she agreed to side with Kade. She helped him kill his father.[122]

name: Beth
description: Fox News anchor Beth exposed Sharon Keller's hoax against Spider-Man (Peter Parker).[123]

name: Betty
description: Betty was a Centerville girl who when she met Buzz with her new hair did not recognize him by taking him for a foreigner.[124]

name: Betty
description: Betty and her boyfriend discovered mutilated bodies in the river near Crimson Falls.[125]

name: Bezukhov
description: Bezukhov was an assistant to Director Vazhin who gave the order to proceed with the extraction of the mystical artifact found at the bottom of the Murmansk harbor.[126]

name: Biker
description: Biker helped the stranger defeat Ma Stillwell and her gang.[127]

name: Bilge
description: Bilge, seeing Turk Barrett being roughed up by Daredevil, he followed orders from Slaughter to kill Turk before he was able to talk. He tossed a molotov cocktail at them, but DD managed to carry Turk away from the blast. DD was caught in the shock force, and was wounded, but tried to get the information out of Bilge anyway. However Elektra was after Alarich Wallenquist, too and threw a sai at Daredevil, knocking him out with a blow to the back of the head. She grabbed hold of Bilge and told him he was a dead man unless he turns over the whereabouts of Wallenquist. Bilge then called Slaughter, though he was under duress from Elektra herself, and managed to speak in code to make Slaughter understand that he'd been captured by the assassin.[128]Bilge was eventually killed by Elektra.[129]

name: Bill
description: Bill attended the press conference in the auditorium of the Avengers Mansion where they announced Hawkeye's membership.[130]

name: Bill
description: Bill and Joe filmed the battle between Iron Man and Titanium Man, so that all, including the US Senate and President, could see Iron Man fighting off this menace.[131]

name: Bill
description: Bill was driving the transcontinental express from New York City to California, which was transporting Reed Richards and Susan Storm. All of a sudden, the Watcher appeared on the tracks in front of the train and gently stopped it, wanting to speak to the half of the Fantastic Four.[132]

name: Bill
description: Bill and Tom were two police officers who confronted Death's Head.[133][134]

name: Bill
description: Bill was one of three pedestrians killed by Bullseye, who hallucinated that they were Daredevil.[135]

name: Bill
description: Bill was a neighbor of Betsy Beatty.[136]

name: Bill
description: Bill and Alice were a couple who lived in the apartment where Puma collapsed from the roof due to the Black Cat's powers of bad luck.[137]

name: Bill
description: Bill was one of the paramedics who brought Stephen Strange to Saint Vincent's Hospital.[138]

name: Bill
description: Bill was one of the teen runaways that Mother Night had brainwashed and when Captain America stormed the camp where they were being trained, Bill fled on Mother Night's orders, giving up the urge to kill Captain America as a companion had suggested.[139]

name: Bill
description: Bill was a crew member on Hal McGee's Secret Hospital.

name: Bill
description: Bill was a child who played in a crumbling building, and when the floor gave way underneath him he was saved by Prowler who fortunately was in the area to try out his new inventions.[141]

name: Bill
description: Bill attended Senator Myles Clennon's press conference at his country estate in Westchester County.[142]

name: Bill
description: Bill was one of the inhabitants of Broxton who lost his job and home and was forced to move to Wichita with his whole family.[143]

name: Bill
description: Bill was on guard outside the C.R.A.D.L.E. operations center discussing music with a colleague when Captain America showed up and asked him to see his boss.[144]

name: Bill
description: Bill was told by Robbie Robertson to stand by for rewrite.[145]

name: Bill
description: Bill was an attorney who Matt Murdock was speaking to at the Manhattan Courthouse in an attempt to reduce the sentence of one of his clients prior to spotting his childhood friend Johnny Squarejohn.[146]

name: Bill
description: Bill was the owner of the Cedar Grand Motor Motel, and was stunned when he saw the Thing and his wife Alicia arrive at his motel, among other things completely ignoring who the Thing was. He tried to stop Walt, an acquaintance of his who had called to show him the strange being, who intended to hit him with his truck through the motel, only to disappear moments before hitting the motel, due to the time loop in which the Cedar town.[147]

name: Billings
description: FDNY Chief Billings hired Johnny Storm as a fireman.[148]

name: Billy
description: Billy was playing in the swamp when Monstrom appeared. He was found by his father and the pair fled when it was found bullets did not stop the creature.[149]

name: Billy
description: Billy was a kid who witnessed Monsteroso rising from under the earth into the Central Park Zoo.[150]

name: Billy
description: Billy witnessed the Fantastic Four's spaceship landing in Central Park.[151]

name: Billy
description: As a child, Billy used to play with his friend Howie in front of Stephen Strange's Mansion.[152]

name: Billy
description: Billy was kidnapped by the Zombie.[153]

name: Billy
description: Billy was one of the workers at the quarry in British Columbia where Logan began to work after establishing himself with Rose O'Hara.[154]

name: Billy
description: Billy was a hot dog vendor at the baseball stadium.[155]

name: Billy
description: Billy was a blind boy who had recently lost his sight due to a muzzle flash. Matt Murdock wandering in New Mexico met him and taught him how to exploit environmental noise to catch a coin on the fly.[156]

name: Billy
description: Billy was a friend of Craig Williams, and he proposed bullying Noah Talbert by taking his lunch money but Craig said no, he felt he was good that day, but when Billy asked him if he was punkin 'out on them, Craig replied that if she kept pushing him he would find out. After witnessing the scene with Talbert threatening Craig with a gun, and Craig totally scared and crying, Billy told Craig he was a loser.[157]

name: Billy
description: Several years later, Billy's father died for a brain tumor, despite Stephen Strange's efforts to cure him.[158]

name: Billy
description: A nurse looking after a convalescent Cain Marko at the hospital. When Cain answered the telepathic projection of his half-brother Charles Xavier calling him Charles, Billy entering Cain's room and seeing no one but him thought he was talking to him but he replied that his name was Billy and also made an ironic joke about the hospital lunch.[159]

name: Billy
description: Billy was the bartender at the Remains of the Day pub, the place frequented by the city's morgues operators.[160]

name: Billy Joe
description: Billy Joe witnessed hundreds of kids walking straight toward the electrified fence of the launch facility, as they were ipnotically attracted by Xemnu to follow him.[161]

name: Billy Joe
description: Billy Joe was an assistant to the Merchant and was ordered to hit Maverick to verify his authenticity. Maverick gave him a loud beating in response, but avoided killing Billy Joe as he was ordered.[162]

name: Bilmes
description: Bilmes, a worker at Baintronics, Inc, told Ms. Bain that Stark Solutions had responded negatively to their request.[163]

name: Binkey
description: Mr. Binkey was the dog of Tom Vocson, Barry Bauman's full-time caregiver who regularly possessed him with his psychic powers in to experience reality and played with Binkey as if he were his dog.[164]

name: Binky
description: Binky was a member of the rival gang of Red Fever who kidnapped Archie Andrews thinking he was their rival criminal due to their resemblance, and together with the other gang members came up against with the Punisher.[165]

name: Binns
description: Mrs. Binns was Alicia Masters' landlord, who was startled by Ben Grimm's unexpected visit.[166]

name: Birch
description: When Donald Birch as a child, while playing in the garden, was visited by his elderly and sick self from the future, he was called back by his mother that it was time for lunch and when Donald told her that there was a man in the trees she told him that not there was no one and it was just his imagination.[167]

name: Bird
description: Bird was a friend of Peter Parker while he was studying at ESU in Pasadena. They met at the Santa Monica Pier where they played chess and systematically Bird beat Peter and during the game Bird constantly rattled off advice to Peter.[168]

name: Bishop
description: Bishop was the leader of the Underground Liberation Army (Earth-616).[169]

name: Black
description: Captain Black became skeptical about the operations of the G.L.F. imposed by their commander ignoring that he was Boris Bullski but he nevertheless accepted to execute them because of his resentment for having been forgotten after the Vietnam War.[170]

name: Black
description: Mulholland Black's father was a grunge musician who abused drugs to the point of dying from an overdose together with his wife, leaving little Mulholland orphaned.[171]

name: Black
description: Mulholland Black's mother was a grunge singer who abused drugs to the point of dying from an overdose together with her husband, leaving little Mulholland orphaned.[171]

name: Blackburn
description: Mr. Blackburn is the lawyer that David Cannon (disguised as Charles Matthews, a chauffeur for the Wasp) hired to steal all of the Wasp's money when she and her husband Ant-Man were presumed dead.[172]

name: Blackie
description: Blackie was a neighborhood garage workshop mechanic who jokingly scuffled with Johnny Storm, until their fighting was ended by Crystal.[173]

name: Blackie
description: Blackie was a customer at Trina's coffee shop, due to him booing Rick Jones, who was on the music stage, Jones knocked him out.[174]

name: Blackie
description: Blackie was one of Lavender's goons. He was confronted by Captain America after their boss managed to shoot at Bucky.[175]

name: Blair
description:
Mr. Blair was the father of the aspiring investigative reporter Betty Blair. While they were at the table, Mr. Blair turned to his daughter and told her that she had eaten almost nothing for her haste to go out and follow an investigative case.[176]
Later Mr. Blair woke up his daughter by pointing out that she had become famous because one of her investigative cases had ended up on the front page of the newspaper.[177]

name: Blair
description: Professor Blair was a scientist who gave Sun Girl a belt that allowed her to travel in Uncara's dimension so as to stop the Uncarians invasion of the Earth.[178]

name: Blair
description: Blair was a student at Dartmouth College who befriended Iceman while he was visiting there.[179]

name: Blair
appearences: Wolverine, Nick Fury: The Scorpio Connection a Marvel Graphic Novel Vol 1 1
description: Blair was a dental hygienist who met Mikel Fury during a cruise vacation in Andros.[180]

name: Blair
description: Blair was a henchman who worked for Roxxon and was among those involved in the murder of Alex Lipton.[181]

name: Blair
description: Blair was a member of the North Institute and was among Nick Fury's jailers in Guantanamo. When he refused to release Fury using the Patriot Act as a justification, this infuriated Fury's attorney, Matt Murdock, who beat Blair and the other jailers.[182]

name: Blake
description: A nuclear engineer, Dr. Blake was killed along with his wife Karen in their own home by Orphan-Maker during the abduction of their daughters Tammy and Sheila by Nanny.[183]

name: Blake
description: Blake was a Midtown High student who was in competition with Peter Parker to get the scholarship to Empire State University.[184]

name: Blanche
description: Blanche was a shop assistant who witnessed the Avengers tracking Jocasta through Madison Avenue. She stood by as her superior Mrs. Pike rather clumsily tried to persuade the Scarlet Witch to become one of the shop’s models, and silently hoped that the interruption would cost Mrs. Pike her job, freeing up a promotion for herself.[185]

name: Blandings
description: Mr. Blandings was a real state realtor from Marion, Missouri. Frank Castle tried to buy a house from him in an attempt to leave his war behind, but a robbery was committed across the street and Castle had no option but to intervene, asking Blandings to call the police.[186]

name: Bloom
description: Astrid's father died of coronary artery failure when she was only seven.[187]

name: Blue Cloud
description: Mary's father, a young girl who had premonitory dreams and for which he sought the help of Iron Fist against the cult that tried to bring her into their ranks.[188]

name: Bluey
description: Bluey was one of the young junkies who attacked Storm when she entered an abandoned apartment building in Harlem. He slashed her hand with his switchblade before being interrupted by Power Man and Misty Knight.[189]

name: Bo
description: Bo was a member of the Friends of Humanity; he was rescued by Spider-Man from Morbius at the Empire State University.[190]

name: Bob
description: Bob and Chuck recognized Prof. August Hopper.[191]

name: Bob
description: Bob was one of Batroc's henchmen who were knocked out by Captain America.[192]

name: Bob
description: Bob spotted Daredevil walking down the street.[193]

name: Bob
description: Bob was one of the doctors who cured Tyros.[194]

name: Bob
description: Bob was a teenager who attempted to occupy the Alley after the Morlocks were gone.[195]

name: Bob
description: Bob was an acquaintance of Michael McTeer.[196]

name: Bob
description: Bob was a police officer from Jackalope who tried to stop Mastermind Excello.[197]

name: Bob
